pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, May 6, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, May 6, 2016:

Toronto, Ontario 

10:00 a.m.  The Prime Minister will visit the Greenwood Subway Yard and will hold a media availability.

Greenwood Subway Yard
400 Greenwood Avenue
Toronto, Ontario

Notes for Media: 

  • Media should arrive at Garage Door #10 no later than 9:00 a.m.
  • Photo opportunity to be followed by a media availability


PMO Media Relations: 
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
